function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficulty in estimating expected degraded performance level for unknown disruptions.","Impact":"Inability to prepare for and mitigate the impact of unknown disruptions on system performance.","Mitigation":"Developing flexible and adaptive response plans that can be applied to a range of disruptive scenarios.","Technologies":"Predictive modeling and simulation tools for scenario planning and risk assessment.","People":"System operators, emergency response teams, and strategic planners.","Owner":"System operators, emergency management agencies, and risk management professionals."},{"Description":"Inability to quantify resilience value within a range of 0 and 1 for dynamic resilience.","Impact":"Lack of clear measurement and comparison of dynamic resilience across systems and entities.","Mitigation":"Developing standardized resilience metrics and indices that enable consistent measurement and comparison of dynamic resilience.","Technologies":"Resilience assessment tools and software for calculating and visualizing resilience metrics.","People":"Resilience researchers, policy makers, and system administrators.","Owner":"Resilience research institutions, government agencies, and system operators."}]}
